languages.text: {n}Следующие восемь часов происходят на удивление спокойно — не происходит ничего необычного, все заверители на месте и принимают просителей, да и вы уже начали потихоньку привыкать к звукам и запахам этого места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Следующие восемь часов происходят на удивление спокойно — не происходит ничего необычного, все заверители на месте и принимают просителей, да и вы уже начали потихоньку привыкать к звукам и запахам этого места.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Следующие восемь часов происходят на удивление спокойно — не происходит ничего необычного, все заверители на месте и принимают просителей, да и вы уже начали потихоньку привыкать к звукам и запахам этого места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

{n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

{n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

languages.text: {n}接下来的八个小时，也同样是出乎意料地平静。没有发生任何不寻常的事情，所有的认证官都在各自的窗口接待请愿者。你甚至已经渐渐开始习惯这个地方的声音与气味了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}接下来的八个小时，也同样是出乎意料地平静。没有发生任何不寻常的事情，所有的认证官都在各自的窗口接待请愿者。你甚至已经渐渐开始习惯这个地方的声音与气味了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las ocho horas siguientes pasan con una calma sorprendente: no ocurre nada fuera de lo normal, todos los oficiales de certificación permanecen en sus ventanillas aceptando solicitantes y ya has empezado a acostumbrarte a los sonidos y olores de este lugar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las ocho horas siguientes pasan con una calma sorprendente: no ocurre nada fuera de lo normal, todos los oficiales de certificación permanecen en sus ventanillas aceptando solicitantes y ya has empezado a acostumbrarte a los sonidos y olores de este lugar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}驚くほど平穏に8時間が経過する。特別なことはなく、全ての認証役が窓口にいて嘆願者を受け入れている。この場所の音と臭いにもすっかり慣れてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}驚くほど平穏に8時間が経過する。特別なことはなく、全ての認証役が窓口にいて嘆願者を受け入れている。この場所の音と臭いにもすっかり慣れてきた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les huit heures suivantes s'écoulent dans un calme étonnant. Rien d'inhabituel ne se produit, les requérants se succèdent aux guichets des agents de certification et vous commencez même à vous habituer aux bruits et aux odeurs qui imprègnent les lieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les huit heures suivantes s'écoulent dans un calme étonnant. Rien d'inhabituel ne se produit, les requérants se succèdent aux guichets des agents de certification et vous commencez même à vous habituer aux bruits et aux odeurs qui imprègnent les lieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die nächsten acht Stunden vergehen überraschend friedlich – nichts Ungewöhnliches passiert, alle Zertifizierungsoffiziere sitzen an ihren Fenstern und bearbeiten Anträge, und du gewöhnst dich sogar langsam an die Geräusche und Gerüche dieses Orts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die nächsten acht Stunden vergehen überraschend friedlich – nichts Ungewöhnliches passiert, alle Zertifizierungsoffiziere sitzen an ihren Fenstern und bearbeiten Anträge, und du gewöhnst dich sogar langsam an die Geräusche und Gerüche dieses Orts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şaşırtıcı derecede olaysız bir biçimde sekiz saat daha geçiyor... Sıra dışı hiçbir şey olduğu yok: Tüm tasdikname memurları bankolarında durup müracaatçıları kabul ediyor. Sense buradaki seslere ve kokulara alışmaya başlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The next eight hours pass surprisingly peacefully — nothing unusual happens, all the certification officers are at their windows and are accepting petitioners, and you have even started growing accustomed to the sounds and smells of this place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Şaşırtıcı derecede olaysız bir biçimde sekiz saat daha geçiyor... Sıra dışı hiçbir şey olduğu yok: Tüm tasdikname memurları bankolarında durup müracaatçıları kabul ediyor. Sense buradaki seslere ve kokulara alışmaya başlıyorsun.{/n}
